title: Backwards and in High Heels
description: Leah, Kate, and Melissa watched all the confirmation hearings for Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson-- so you don't have to. Here's our recap of the best, worst, and weirdest moments throughout four days of questioning.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
